#summary Third-party stuff which may be useful with QBoard

Here are some links to third-party materials which one might find useful with QBoard:

  * [http://www.webwargaming.com/maps/blankmap.html A set of blank hex maps of various sizes].
  * [http://www.wanderinghorse.net/gaming/maps/ Free gaming maps]
  * [http://www.wanderinghorse.net/gaming/counters/ Free gaming counters]
  * [http://www.nomic.net/~uckelman/mkhexgrid/ mkhexgrid] is an excellent, flexible, multi-platform hex grid creator program which can output to PNG, SVG, and EPS.
  * [http://www.grognard.com/aides.html links to PBEM-related aids]
  * [http://www.godsmonsters.com/?ART=111 Free hex maps] and a tool to generate them.
  * [http://direpress.bin.sh/tools/dungeon.cgi Random dungeon generator]
